projects.name: Hawaii and Southern California Geochemical Comparison
projects.description: A research project comparing the geochemistry of the Hawaiian Islands and Southern California. Done in collaboration with the Geoscience Research Institute and Southern Adventist University.

projects.name: SAU Missions Dashboard
projects.description: A simple frontend UI for Southern Adventist University which displays information about current student missionaries.

projects.name: AutoAttend
projects.description: A proof-of-concept application levaraging open source face vectorization models and vector databases to perform automated classroom attendance tracking via facial recognition.

projects.name: Youtube Gallery
projects.description: A simple script which generates an interactive gallery of Youtube videos from a playlist with client-side caching.

projects.name: Snake in Rust
projects.description: A very simple snake game built in Rust and compiled for WASM

projects.name: Constraint Based Programming
projects.description: A simple visualizer for constraint based programming. Done in Javascript!

projects.name: Segmentation Simulator
projects.description: A memory segmentation and virtual address translation visualizer.

projects.name: RayCalc
projects.description: A cross-platform radiation dosimetry app build for emergency situations.

projects.name: Maze Generator
projects.description: A simple maze generator built using the JavaScript canvas. (And a C++ version too)

projects.name: Word Search Generator
projects.description: A word search generator built using the JavaScript. Comes with a solver!
